scripts.dev: npm run build-dev && port=8086 node broadcaster/dist/server.js
scripts.build-dev: npm run build-app-dev && npm run build-server
scripts.build: npm run build-app && npm run build-server
scripts.build-app-prod: (cd warzone-ui && ng build --prod) && rm -r broadcaster/dist/ui/*; cp -r warzone-ui/dist broadcaster/dist/ui
scripts.build-app-dev: (cd warzone-ui && ng build) && rm -r broadcaster/dist/ui/*; cp -r warzone-ui/dist/* broadcaster/dist/ui/
